A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible movie. Bad story telling\, just because it is a SW movie made by Disney doesn't mean that I have to love it. Marvel story telling - which works for Marvel movies does not work in a star wars story. Bad editing\, inappropriate humor\, and heavy handed political message. Please stop insulting us. If you still have not seen it yet\, save yourself some money and take yourself out to dinner instaed.
